lead_paragraph: BERNE, Switzerland, Saturday, Oct. 4 -- German forces on the front southwest of Leningrad were reported by Moscow early today to be attempting in vain large-scale counter-attacks in a wide area with the aim of breaking the Russian line established yesterday when the city's defenders established contact with large tank divisions from the Valdai Heights for the first major change in the northern situation in four weeks.

byline.original: By DANIEL T. BRIGHAMBy Telephone to THE NEW YORK TIMES
